last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Lives are at stake, with John's loyalties torn and more revelations to come, while Rhona questions Chrissie, but home truths prove more dangerous.

name: Rebus
overview: Iconic character John Rebus is reimagined as a younger Detective Sergeant, drawn into a violent criminal conflict that turns personal when his brother Michael, a former soldier, crosses the line into criminality.

seasons.name: Series 1
seasons.overview: In Edinburgh's murky underbelly, DS Rebus is drawn into a violent criminal conflict that turns personal.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A violent street attack is investigated by DS John Rebus and new detective Siobhan Clarke. However, it's Johnâ€™s family that pose unexpected problems, along with an awkward affair.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Hard-up Michael Rebus's rash act in Fife has bloody consequences for his brother John, who faces a fatal confrontation. Meanwhile, Siobhan finds out who stopped the street attack, and John confesses to contact with criminal Cafferty.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: John's words come back to haunt him, while his brother abducts drug dealer Darryl Christie and recruits ex-army comrades for a risky raid. John hears his paralysed former partner's confession.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: John is frustrated at family gatherings, unaware that the Cafferty and Christie rivalry is viciously escalating, with Michael at its heart.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Michael has motivation to kill Cafferty, as has John, while Darryl Christie tries retaliation, using Siobhan to help his plan.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Lives are at stake, with John's loyalties torn and more revelations to come, while Rhona questions Chrissie, but home truths prove more dangerous.
